title: Fix Pixel 4 XL after installing Magisk Modul - remove Magisk
content:
due to a wrong module my Pixel 4 XL does not boot anymore, or my screen remains dark after booting. Is there a way to remove Magisk modules? The tip https://www.droidviews.com/fix-pixel-4-xl-bootloop-magisk-module/ does not work for me, because flashing the "image-newpixel4xl.img" stops with an error message.

i have the latest april-software and i can still get into fastboot mode without problems.

thanks a lot
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
